channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenVPN -- OpenVPN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenVPN -- OpenVPN

item.title: CVE-2023-7235|2024-02-21T10:55:15.487Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: The OpenVPN GUI installer before version 2.6.9 did not set the proper access control restrictions to the installation directory of OpenVPN binaries when using a non-standard installation path, which allows an attacker to replace binaries to run arbitrary executables.
